name: The orc battle
description:
A simple and small project for a Coursera's game development course.
You are an orc that was lost in time and needs to fight some guys with futuristic weapons that belongs to a secret society of time anomaly erradication. You need to survive in your first battle.

Estudiantes de Coursera : link al formulario de auto-evaluación :
